explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a man wearing black-rimmed glasses and a black T-shirt appearing in a bathroom. He has curly blond hair and golden earrings. The bathroom has off-white marble walls and a transparent glass shower room with silver shower equipment. Above the video, there are white subtitles "Joy: My theme song is the best!" with Joy's cartoon avatar.
[0-4] Then the man talks with a smile, his left hand gesturing in front of him, a silver ring on his left ring finger.
